title: Finding Your Purpose in God's Plan
description: Discover how God has uniquely designed you for His greater purpose
author: Joyce Meyer
verseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.

title: The Power of Morning Prayer
description: Start your day with intention and divine connection
author: Billy Graham
verseText: Very early in the morning, while it was still dark, Jesus got up, left the house and went off to a solitary place, where he prayed.

title: Overcoming Fear with Faith
description: Transform anxiety into trust through God's promises
author: Priscilla Shirer
verseText: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.

title: Drawing the Power of Jesus Christ into Our Lives
description: Practical ways to show Christ's love in everyday moments
author: President Russell M. Nelson
verseText: The gospel of Jesus Christ is filled with His power, which is available to every earnestly seeking daughter or son of God.

title: Gratitude Changes Everything
description: Discover the transformative power of a thankful heart
author: Josie Robinson
verseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.

title: Finding Peace in Chaos
description: God's peace that surpasses all understanding in difficult times
author: Steven Furtick
verseText: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
